title: MC1.8怎么让自定义村民交易有数据值的物品
author: punyyy
txt_content:
MC1.8怎么让自定义村民交易有数据值的物品，比如说如何交易凋零骷髅头

求示例

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
summon Villager ~ ~2 ~ {NoAI:1,Invulnerable:1,CustomName:"辅助交易",CustomNameVisible:true,Profession:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999,rewardExp:0b,buy:{id:skull,Damage:1,Count:3},buyB:{id:soul_sand,Count:4},sell:{id:nether_star,Count:1}}]}复制代码
刚才论坛自动加了一些不需要的html标签。。。。。

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
summon Villager ~ ~2 ~ {NoAI:1,Invulnerable:1,CustomName:"辅助交易",CustomNameVisible:true,Profession:1,Offers:{Recipes:[
{maxUses:9999,rewardExp:0b,buy:{id:skull,Damage:1,Count:3},buyB:{id:soul_sand,Count:4},sell:{id:nether_star,Count:1}}]}}
复制代码

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:0,Career:1,CareerLevel:9999999,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:物品ID,Count:数量,Damage:损伤值},sell:{id:物品ID,Count:数量,Damage:损伤值,tag:{display:{Lore:["1","2","3","4"]}}}}]}}
红色部分是可选内容。
